items.sentence: I will compose a piece on the recorder.
Taylor Swift fans created an earthquake.
I asked my teacher if she will excuse me to go to the bathroom.
I will invite Ashton to come over for a sleep over.
I try not to misbehave at other people's houses.
Longitude measures distance east or west of the prime meridian.
I am very polite at other people's houses.
The TV remote is black, with a bit of purple.
I suppose I will go to the pool with Mom.
I will trace a line to practice my cursive.
I sometimes give a valentine to each person in my class.
Sometimes we play zone-defence in flag football.
We have to brake at the red light.
I hear voices in the distance.
I like it here, in Tucson.
